subject: Talladega Superspeedway
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart appeared to lock down the pole position at Talladega Superspeedway with a stout qualifying lap. Joe Nemechek, the 46th of 47 drivers to make a qualifying attempt for Sunday’s Aaron’s 499, stole his thunder, knocking Stewart off the pole with a lap of 187.386 miles per hour, to better Stewart’s 186.896. It was his first pole since 2005.
